quote: The name of the first is Piʹshon; it is the one encircling the entire land of Havʹi·lah, where there is gold.
Now in those days, after Moses had become an adult, he went out to his brothers to look at the burdens they were bearing, and he caught sight of an Egyptian beating a Hebrew, one of his brothers.
For today there was born to you in David’s city a savior, who is Christ the Lord.
